cards.name: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition

mc.name: Terramorphic Expanse
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Voltaic Key
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}: Untap target artifact.
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}: Untap target artifact.
mc.flavorText: The missing piece to every puzzle.

mc.name: Whispersilk Cloak
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature is unblockable.
Equipped creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature is unblockable.
Equipped creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

mc.name: Urza's Rage
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Urza's Rage can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If Urza's Rage was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that creature or player and the damage can't be prevented.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Urza's Rage can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If Urza's Rage was kicked, instead Urza's Rage deals 10 damage to that creature or player and the damage can't be prevented.

mc.name: Yavimaya Elder
mc.oracleText:
When Yavimaya Elder is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
{2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
When Yavimaya Elder is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
{2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

mc.name: Phyrexian Processor
mc.oracleText:
As Phyrexian Processor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life.
{4}, {T}: Put an X/X black Minion creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered the battlefield.
mc.printedText:
As Phyrexian Processor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life.
{4}, {T}: Put an X/X black Minion creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered the battlefield.

mc.name: Voltaic Key
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}: Untap target artifact.
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}: Untap target artifact.
mc.flavorText: The key did not work on a single lock, yet it opened many doors.

mc.name: Armadillo Cloak
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
mc.flavorText: "Don't laugh. It works."

mc.name: Phyrexian Negator
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Whenever Phyrexian Negator is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Whenever Phyrexian Negator is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents.
mc.flavorText: They exist to cease.

mc.name: Darigaaz, the Igniter
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Darigaaz, the Igniter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, choose a color, then that player reveals his or her hand and Darigaaz deals damage to the player equal to the number of cards of that color revealed this way.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Darigaaz, the Igniter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, choose a color, then that player reveals his or her hand and Darigaaz deals damage to the player equal to the number of cards of that color revealed this way.

mc.name: Elfhame Palace
mc.oracleText:
Elfhame Palace enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Elfhame Palace enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Llanowar has seven elfhames, or kingdoms, each with its own ruler. Their palaces are objects of awe, wonder, and envy.

mc.name: Fertile Ground
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
mc.printedText:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
mc.flavorText: As Phyrexians descended, Multani paused to reflect on the beauty that might never be seen again.

mc.name: Harrow
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to cast Harrow, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
As an additional cost to cast Harrow, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: No spot in nature is truly barren.

mc.name: Nomadic Elf
mc.oracleText: {1}{G}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {1}{G}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: "I've journeyed across Dominaria. Phyrexians are everywhere. Plague is everywhere. There's no place left to hide."

mc.name: Phyrexian Battleflies
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{B}: Phyrexian Battleflies gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{B}: Phyrexian Battleflies gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.
mc.flavorText: After encountering them, Squee finally lost his appetite for bugs.

mc.name: Power Armor
mc.oracleText: Domain -- {3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.printedText: Domain -- {3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.flavorText:
"Great peril demands formidable weaponry."
--Urza

mc.name: Rith, the Awakener
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Rith, the Awakener deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, choose a color, then put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each permanent of that color.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Rith, the Awakener deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, choose a color, then put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each permanent of that color.

mc.name: Shivan Oasis
mc.oracleText:
Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Only the hardiest explorers survive to eat the fruit.

mc.name: Thornscape Apprentice
mc.oracleText:
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
{R}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
{R}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

mc.name: Treva, the Renewer
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Treva, the Renewer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, choose a color, then you gain 1 life for each permanent of that color.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Treva, the Renewer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, choose a color, then you gain 1 life for each permanent of that color.

mc.name: Bone Shredder
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Echo {2}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Bone Shredder enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Echo {2}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Bone Shredder enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.

mc.name: Phyrexian Debaser
mc.oracleText:
Flying

{T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Debaser: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Debaser: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The second stage of the illness: high fever and severe infectiousness."
--Phyrexian progress notes

mc.name: Phyrexian Defiler
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Defiler: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Defiler: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The third stage of the illness: muscle aches and persistent cough."
--Phyrexian progress notes

mc.name: Phyrexian Denouncer
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Denouncer: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Denouncer: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The first stage of the illness: rash and nausea."
--Phyrexian progress notes

mc.name: Phyrexian Plaguelord
mc.oracleText:
{T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Plaguelord: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Plaguelord: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The final stage of the illness: delirium, convulsions, and death."
--Phyrexian progress notes

mc.name: Order of Yawgmoth
mc.oracleText:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Whenever Order of Yawgmoth deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
mc.printedText:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Whenever Order of Yawgmoth deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

mc.name: Phyrexian Ghoul
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

mc.name: Priest of Gix
mc.oracleText: When Priest of Gix enters the battlefield, add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: When Priest of Gix enters the battlefield, add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
"Gix doesn't want a people to rule but puppets to entertain his madness."
--Xantcha, Phyrexian outcast

mc.name: Phyrexian Arena
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
mc.flavorText: An audience of one with the malice of thousands.

mc.name: Phyrexian Hulk
mc.flavorText:
It doesn't think. It doesn't feel.
It doesn't laugh or cry.
All it does from dusk till dawn
Is make the soldiers die.
--Onean children's rhyme

mc.name: Slay
mc.oracleText:
Destroy target green creature. It can't be regenerated.
Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Destroy target green creature. It can't be regenerated.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: The elves had the edge in guile, skill, and valor. But in the end, only sheer numbers mattered.

mc.name: Dark Ritual
mc.oracleText: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
"From void evolved Phyrexia. Great Yawgmoth, Father of Machines, saw its perfection. Thus the Grand Evolution began."
--Phyrexian Scriptures

mc.name: Puppet Strings
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.
mc.flavorText: "Have no illusions," Volrath warned Greven, "about free will."

mc.name: Lightning Greaves
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0} ({0}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature has shroud and haste.
Equip {0}
mc.flavorText: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

mc.name: Phyrexian Totem
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{2}{B}: Phyrexian Totem becomes a 5/5 black Horror artifact creature with trample until end of turn.
Whenever Phyrexian Totem is dealt damage, if it's a creature, sacrifice that many permanents.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{2}{B}: Phyrexian Totem becomes a 5/5 black Horror artifact creature with trample until end of turn.
Whenever Phyrexian Totem is dealt damage, if it's a creature, sacrifice that many permanents.

mc.name: Thornscape Battlemage
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {R} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {R} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.)
When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {R} kicker, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {W} kicker, destroy target artifact.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {R} and/or {W}(You may pay an additional {R} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.)
When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {R} kicker, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {W} kicker, destroy target artifact.

mc.name: Tribal Flames
mc.oracleText: Domain -- Tribal Flames deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
mc.printedText: Domain -- Tribal Flames deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
mc.flavorText:
"Fire is the universal language."
--Jhoira, master artificer

mc.name: Hornet Cannon
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying and haste named Hornet onto the battlefield. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying and haste named Hornet onto the battlefield. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step.

mc.name: Allied Strategies
mc.oracleText: Domain -- Target player draws a card for each basic land type among lands he or she controls.
mc.printedText: Domain -- Target player draws a card for each basic land type among lands he or she controls.
mc.flavorText: Each commander looked at the others and wondered who would be first to break the alliance.

mc.name: Darigaaz's Charm
mc.oracleText: Choose one -- Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand; or Darigaaz's Charm deals 3 damage to target creature or player; or target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Choose one -- Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand; or Darigaaz's Charm deals 3 damage to target creature or player; or target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

mc.name: Rith's Charm
mc.oracleText: Choose one -- Destroy target nonbasic land; or put three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield; or prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.
mc.printedText: Choose one -- Destroy target nonbasic land; or put three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield; or prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.

mc.name: Sunscape Battlemage
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{G} and/or {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} and/or {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
When Sunscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {1}{G} kicker, destroy target creature with flying.
When Sunscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {2}{U} kicker, draw two cards.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {1}{G} and/or {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} and/or {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
When Sunscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {1}{G} kicker, destroy target creature with flying.
When Sunscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {2}{U} kicker, draw two cards.

mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{B} and/or {G} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} and/or {G} as you cast this spell.)
When Thunderscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {1}{B} kicker, target player discards two cards.
When Thunderscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {G} kicker, destroy target enchantment.

Kicker {1}{B} and/or {G} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} and/or {G} as you cast this spell.)

When Thunderscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {G} kicker, destroy target enchantment.

mc.name: Treva's Charm
mc.oracleText: Choose one -- Destroy target enchantment; or exile target attacking creature; or draw a card, then discard a card.
mc.printedText: Choose one -- Destroy target enchantment; or exile target attacking creature; or draw a card, then discard a card.

mc.name: Gerrard Capashen
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand.
{3}{W}: Tap target creature. Activate this ability only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand.
{3}{W}: Tap target creature. Activate this ability only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.

mc.name: Coalition Relic
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color to your mana pool for each counter removed this way.

mc.name: Terramorphic Expanse
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Phyrexian Colossus
mc.oracleText:
Phyrexian Colossus doesn't untap during your untap step.
Pay 8 life: Untap Phyrexian Colossus.
Phyrexian Colossus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
mc.printedText:
Phyrexian Colossus doesn't untap during your untap step.
Pay 8 life: Untap Phyrexian Colossus.
Phyrexian Colossus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

mc.name: Sanguine Guard
mc.oracleText:
First strike
{1}{B}: Regenerate Sanguine Guard.
mc.printedText:
First strike
{1}{B}: Regenerate Sanguine Guard.
mc.flavorText:
"Father of Machines! Your filigree gaze carves us, and the scars dance upon our grateful flesh."
--Phyrexian Scriptures

mc.name: Hornet
mc.oracleText: Flying, haste
mc.printedText: Flying, haste

mc.name: Carrion Feeder
mc.oracleText:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.
mc.printedText:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.
mc.flavorText: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.

mc.name: Phyrexian Broodlings
mc.oracleText: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Phyrexian Broodlings.
mc.printedText: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Phyrexian Broodlings.
mc.flavorText: With limited resources and near unlimited time, Kerrick used parts from one beast to build another.

mc.name: Phyrexian Gargantua
mc.oracleText: When Phyrexian Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
mc.printedText: When Phyrexian Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
mc.flavorText: Other Phyrexians have nightmares about the gargantua.

mc.name: Phyrexian Vault
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"The secrets of Phyrexia are expensive. You will pay in brass and bone, steel and sinew."
--Kaervek

mc.name: Worn Powerstone
mc.oracleText:
Worn Powerstone enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {2} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Worn Powerstone enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {2} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Even a fragment of a powerstone contains within it not just energy, but space--vast dimensions trapped in fragile crystal.

mc.name: Living Death
mc.oracleText: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

mc.name: Tendrils of Corruption
mc.oracleText: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.
mc.printedText: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.
mc.flavorText: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.

mc.name: Whispersilk Cloak
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature is unblockable.
Equipped creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature is unblockable and has shroud.
Equip {2}
mc.flavorText: Such cloaks are in high demand both by assassins and by those who fear them.

mc.name: Hideous End
mc.oracleText: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
mc.printedText: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
mc.flavorText: Death is a generous author, always willing to grant a stirring final chapter.

mc.name: Exotic Curse
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Domain -- Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Domain -- Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.flavorText:
Fouler than a necromancer's kiss.
--Jamuraan expression

mc.name: Narrow Escape
mc.oracleText: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. You gain 4 life.
mc.printedText: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. You gain 4 life.
mc.flavorText: He could find no strength left to budge, no power left to fight, no will left to live. Luckily, they could find him.

mc.name: Evasive Action
mc.oracleText: Domain -- Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.printedText: Domain -- Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.flavorText: Effective use of terrain is a lesson good commanders learn quickly.

mc.name: Gerrard's Command
mc.oracleText: Untap target creature. It gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Untap target creature. It gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Unless you like the idea of becoming some goblin's lunch, get up and move!"

mc.name: Phyrexian Hulk
mc.flavorText: An invasion weapon of ages past, the glistening oil contained the blueprints of countless atrocities.
